text: Gerard Bernacki (3 November 1942 - 21 December 2018) was a Polish Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1967. He was titular bishop of Sala Consilina and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Katowice, Poland, from 1988 to 2012.Gerald Bernacki Bernacki died on 21 December 2018 in Prudnik, Poland at the age of 76.bp Gerard Bernacki He was buried in Katowice. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops
title: Gerard Bernacki
